title: The eligible Slum Dwellers shall be shifted to temporary Transit Camp or on minimum monthly rent as may be mutually decided by C
clause_text: The eligible Slum Dwellers shall be shifted to temporary Transit Camp or on minimum monthly rent as may be mutually decided by C.E.O., S.R.A. with proposed society and developer and shall be paid by the developer to the eligible slum dwellers to be temporarily shifted for allowing construction on site till allotment of permanent rehabilitation tenements.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
